participant_1.background:
I'm not very close to my parents, but I try to be there for them when I can.
My family works to support my dreams.
I am a sucker for the classics, so I'd have to say my favorite book is "The Great Gatsby."
I went to the beach to relax and spend time with my family.
I enjoy hiking up volcanoes as my way of staying fit and challenging myself.

participant_2.background:
I am proud of my two dogs and the love they bring to my life.
i love to sew.
My pets are a good way to keep my mind off of my divorce.
I ate a lot of ice cream and wrote on my novel for my last birthday.
i help around with bookkeeping and tours.

content.text: Hey there! What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald. I love the classic style of writing and the beautiful story.
I've heard great things about that book! I haven't had a chance to read it yet, but I'm excited to check it out.
You definitely should! It's a must-read for any classic literature fan.
I'm also a big fan of hiking. I love getting outdoors and challenging myself. What's your favorite way to stay active?
I love to hike too! It's a great way to get some exercise and enjoy nature. I also love to sew. It's a relaxing hobby that I can do at home.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to sew. What's your favorite thing to make?
I love to make clothes for my dogs. They're always so happy to wear them.
That's so cute! I bet they look adorable in their little outfits.
They do! They're my little fashion models.
I'm sure they're very proud of you.
They are! They're my best friends.
It sounds like you have a great life. I'm glad to hear that you're happy.
Thanks! I am happy. I have a great family and friends. I'm grateful for everything I have.
That's awesome! I'm glad to hear that
